FindMy2ElfSiblingsElfHiding1.text: Why do we have to be considered family to that human?
Hmm? Get away, you will ruin my hiding spot.

FindMy2ElfSiblingsCompleteElf1.text: Why did you have to tell $FindMy2ElfSiblings.OlderSibling.FirstName$ where I was?

FindMy2ElfSiblingsCompleteElf2.text: Your no fun. You ruined my hiding spot!

FindMy2ElfSiblingsCompleteElf3.text: Wait till mom hears about this!
